newsitem.title: FINLAND: Finnish bonds end firmer, seen outperforming Bunds.
newsitem.headline: Finnish bonds end firmer, seen outperforming Bunds.

text.p: 1205/1005 GMT - Finnish bonds strengthened slightly on Tuesday and yields eased a few basis points on last minute short-covering. Activity was very muted and the downward move in yields was largely technical, dealers said.
Large benchmark bond issuance by the state is likely to keep yields from falling markedly early in 1997, but there is room for the long-end yield gap over Germany to narrow, they said.
*FIM-06 yld pct 6.21 vs 6.23 *06 gap over Bund bps 45 vs 46
*FIM-04 yld pct 5.79 vs 5.81 *FIM-99 yld pct 3.75 vs 3.75
*Mar FRAs pct 3.16 vs 3.17 *Dec '97 FRAs pct 3.82 vs 3.80
